fullText:
If you’re new to coding and you’re using AI to code, PLEASE slow down.

Ask questions. 

Break problems apart. 

Have AI explain concepts.

Throwing Cursor into Agent mode and hitting “command enter” for a few hours helps no one.

Use the incredible tutor we’ve been given.
